games.title: Escape Nexus: Singularity Run
games.description: Race through the facility before the singularity ignites.

rooms.name: Cryo Intake
rooms.description: Wake up and stabilize the cryo systems before sprinting out.

puzzles.title: Reboot Sequence
puzzles.description: Restart the cryo control cluster without tripping failsafes.
hints: Power cycles must follow the blue-green-orange order.
Pair the thermal reset with the pressure equalizer toggle.
The last step is a manual override on the console.

rooms.name: Transit Hall
rooms.description: Navigate the evacuated hall and bypass the mag-lock pattern wall.

puzzles.title: Mag-Lock Pattern
puzzles.description: Decode the alternating magnetic locks before power surges.
hints: Observe the pulsing lights: they echo the safe pattern.
Reset any lock that pulses red twice.
The final sequence is blue, blue, green, amber.

rooms.name: Core Vault
rooms.description: Align the reactor and vent energy before the singularity stabilizes.

puzzles.title: Reactor Alignment
puzzles.description: Synchronize the quantum regulators and field dampers.
hints: Lock the primary coolant rings first.
Align the regulator phases to match the holographic display.
Stabilize the output by venting the upper conduits.
Seal the chamber by engaging the twin dampers simultaneously.
